QuestData.Title: Rescuing the Taken
QuestData.Description: We are doing our best to contain de fighting in Zanchul and not let it spill out into de other terraces, but we can't hold for long.$b$bIf you are going to help, start by freeing Wardruid Loti. Dey are trying to break her on de platform above with a dark ritual.$b$bHer soul is bound to a fetish. You must find dat fetish if you are going to free her.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Wardruid Loti at Zanchul.
